name: Total Annihilation
notes:
Alert will come up saying you should install DirectX found on the CD, you can ignore this.
In-game resolution can be changed in Options > Visuals.

files.installer: N/A:Select the Total Annihilation installer provided by GOG.

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Total Annihilation/TotalA.exe
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the Total Annihilation installer provided by GOG.
game:
  gogid: 1207658880
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /SILENT /NOGUI /SUPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directplay
    description: Installing...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
